snippet.title: Little Medusa Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Little Medusa is an action puzzler about a Greek goddess having a terrible hair day- after Artemiza draws the ire of a fellow goddess, she finds herself transformed into a Gorgon. With snakes in her hair and a mind set on revenge, Artemiza must fight her way to the top of Mount Olympus in Little Medusa.

Get your copy at: https://megacatstudios.com/collections/nes-games/products/little-medusa

Come join in on the discussion at our official Discord: https://discordapp.com/invite/megacat

Little Medusa is not licensed, sponsored, published, or endorsed by Nintendo Co. Ltd, or their affiliates.

Mega Cat Studios is an independent games development studio. This title is an unofficial and unlicensed release for the Nintendo console, and is not affiliated with Nintendo Co., Ltd, or their affiliates. 

Nintendo® and Famicom® are trademarks of Nintendo Co., Ltd.
For more on Mega Cat Studios and our games, please visit: https://megacatstudios.com/

Come play & talk on discord! www.discord.gg/megacat
